website_summaries.verdict: From a reputable manufacturer, this user-friendly set of two smaller subwoofers can be installed straight out of the box.
cons: Some describe sound as "boomy" rather than clear and crisp

customer_reviews.title: Everything you’d expect from Rockford Fosgate.
customer_reviews.text: Great great box and subs. The two P1s sound unreal in my car. They hit plenty hard with the right amp. Not earth shattering, but I don’t see the purpose In that anyway. I was looking at this box and the MTX terminators. Go with these everyday. You’ll spend an extra $100 but you can see the Rockford Fosgate quality the second you take a look at the box. Everything works great and my god is the box beautiful in person. I’ve had it for a week and received countless compliments from coworkers on how badass they look. You can tell it’s a quality box with some quality speakers, even if you know nothing about car audio.
customer_reviews.author: David Huntzberry

customer_reviews.title: unbeatable combination of price, quality and easy install
customer_reviews.text: The Rockford Fosgate name means quality and this box lives up to the name. It's big and heavy(shipping weight was over 60lbs)but it's a plug and play solution for serious bass if you have the space. I got a great deal on mine but even at full price it's hard to beat for simplicity and sound quality. It's not rattle the neighborhood loud but it sounds great inside my car. The one and only gripe I have is the lack of protective speaker grills: they can be purchased separately for $20/each.
customer_reviews.author: GwallyWally

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, make sure check the measurements for the box
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I didn't realize how big it was going to be though. Make sure you check the measurements in your trunk. The pictures are in a 2017 Honda Civic if that helps. The bass sounds awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Immanuel Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Deep, powerful, and surprisingly tight bass for a ported type enclosure
customer_reviews.text: Very deep and fairly accurate bass production, especially coming from a ported box. Very little, if any distortion and very high volume. Looks extremely sharp too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vladrakulya

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker/box combo
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected from Rockford. Sound is great mind you these are 10s. Pretty good thump. Well designed box and great fit in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: stephen toryak

customer_reviews.title: Bass hits
customer_reviews.text: These hit hard. I could annoy my whole block if I wanted. Also my truck is so small I can’t fit 2x12 but these fit perfect and have the power I want.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Subs for 2018 Honda Civic EX sedan
customer_reviews.text: Bought these subs as part of my new sound system for my car. Can’t be happier.. LOVE them. Installed them with a Rockford Fosgate R500X1D Prime amp and an AudioControl LC2i LOC. They make my whole car shake. The bass is incredible. The bass knob is perfect. You can control how much bass you want. Great product and perfect fit for a 2018 Honda Civic EX sedan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck honestly.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the cleanest set ups you can get. I have this currently in the back of my 2019 Mustang and I couldn't be any happier. Not to loud but definitely has the bump you need and ITS CLEAN SOUNDING. Not crazy like if you had put two 12's back there. Couldn't be any happier honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Hunt

customer_reviews.title: INSANITY
customer_reviews.text: Things bang. Will not go wrong with em. Insane bass. Pulling off some bag tricks with them on some songs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Turley

customer_reviews.title: I have the alpine s series 6.5 in the front blessed
customer_reviews.text: I went with the 500watt p1 Why well I already had the jbl 3 way 6x8 rated at 100watts rmsx4 so my fronts and rear where in place all I needed was a little Bass and thats what I got matched system
customer_reviews.author: Bynes

customer_reviews.title: Love this setup!
customer_reviews.text: Never been happier with subs!!!!!! Super happy and proud of this set up!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Wald

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I like to fast easy way it got here hassle free trouble free in on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then Kicker subs for sure
customer_reviews.text: Didn't take long for the package to arrive. When hooked it up it was very clean and crisp bass. Definitely hits hard. Better then Kicker subs for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hit hard paired with a 500watt fosgate amp. Clean deep bass, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dre Rob

customer_reviews.title: Clean, rock solid build
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, but build is rock solid. Hits hard, sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good subs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of subs work well sound great. Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Louis Urban

customer_reviews.title: Not Up To The Task.....
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with Rockford Fosgate R500X1D Prime AMP & it blew within a week. If you're looking for something with more power handling & kick. Get the P2's or if you want all around better subs. Get some Kicker Comp R's. These can't even handle their power rating for long periods of time. When the one sub blew, I had been playing it at a good volume for about 20 minutes straight.
customer_reviews.author: Da Alpha Supreme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice speakers bout to get a next car and im putting the same thing in it
customer_reviews.author: Audrea Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing subs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic subs! Bought them for a 2006 Hyundai sonata, and when turned up they shake everything. Box is very neat and clean so everything looks great in the trunk. Paired it with a Rockford 500 watt mono amp and they work perfectly together. Next step is to buy a cap to ease the load on the alternator. Overall though great subs for the price, nothing wrong with them, and still hitting hard.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great box, bad smell!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound,except the sinky glue smell starts when you pump up the volume.bass bass! Then you get funk funk!
customer_reviews.author: Julez Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Need bass? These have what you need!
customer_reviews.text: I knew Rockford was awesome from what I had heard and been told, I sampled the 12inch P1's at Car Toys and instantly fell in love, but why would I pay for their outrageous prices? Well I didn't have to so i didn't and I was able to get this originally priced setup for $240 instead of $250 and I was stoked. I could not be happier with the outcome I have now running a 1000watt hifonics amp to them at about 350-400 RMS at the moment but they can handle. The deep clean bass is superior, and if you are considering this system among others there is no need you will not be let down by these Fosgate subs!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: They'll blow your mind, your eardrums, and the back end of your car off.
customer_reviews.text: This thing pumps out so much my cheap as hell car fell apart... I would've given it five stars but now I have to buy a whole new car just to listen to these.
customer_reviews.author: Slader Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding subs!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome subs, does the job for me and sounds great. No issues with them yet, had them over a year now. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kiser

customer_reviews.title: wiring. load
customer_reviews.text: My head unit is shutting off due to a power surge. Technician says its because of the location of my ground being on the floorboard bolt for the seatbelt. I need to use self-tapping screws. Because of the amp saying 500 watts but on the birth certificate saying 795 actual watts its too much power for these dual subs. My only question is what are these dual subs wired as? 1ohm, 2ohm? I need to know to correctly fix this issue as well.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Rockford Fosgate P1 10 in x2
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Quality , fast 2 day shipping, great price , and wow these speakers BUMP ! Cant get much better than this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: Put these in a 2018 Civic Sport hatchback and they're perfect for it. You won't win any competitions or crack any pavement. But, they pound pretty hard for only being 500 watts! I was pretty skeptical at first, but they definitely do work! They don't sound distorted when turned up. Nice, smooth, hard hitting bass. I'd buy these again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: These subs and a R500x1D amp and you have a solid begginer system!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect step up from the R1 series Subs from Rockford Fosgate. P1s are just louder and pretty crisp when paired with a RF r500x1d amp. You can't go wrong with the performance with these and the box is grade A quality. Clean face plate and looks good with a LED light in the middle inside. I would recommend these all day. Dubstep, country, rock, rap, all sound pretty good. Bassheads will enjoy these.
customer_reviews.author: LaxBouas

customer_reviews.title: First system so not sure how it compares to other ...
customer_reviews.text: First system so not sure how it compares to other systems, it would also matter on your overall hookup. Overall, aesthetically pleasing and works just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Price quality  very good
customer_reviews.text: Great product ,excellent price ,fast shipping This company vminnovations is too good
customer_reviews.author: Karim A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great! My son loves having great sound in his car.
customer_reviews.author: T Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Mustang
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 2014 this fits PERFECTLY in the trunk to where the spare tire is still accessible. Have Fosgate amp making my car shake like crazy. Hits hard.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: not going to set off any car alarms but perfect for the setup i was going for
customer_reviews.text: solid subs. not going to set off any car alarms but perfect for the setup i was going for.
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: Hard Hitting Bass.
customer_reviews.text: I have had many sub-woofers in the past, but these are by far the cleanest and hardest hitting subs I have ever owned. Very clean sound, they are ported so the bass is more of deep bass vs punch bass. I am running Rockford Fosgate Punch P500-2 amplifier in bridged mode to drive them.
customer_reviews.author: Z Reviews

customer_reviews.title: BEST SUBWOOFER! A MUST HAVE YOU NEED TO BUY ...
customer_reviews.text: BEST SUBWOOFER ! A MUST HAVE YOU NEED TO BUY THIS TODAY...
customer_reviews.author: FA6900

customer_reviews.title: Paired with the Rockford R500X1D = BOOOOOM
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with the 500x1d RF amp. Honestly wasn't expected a ton of movement out of these subs but man was i put to shame. THESE THINGS BOUNCE LIKE CRAZY. Im so glad i spent the extra $50 and bought these over the MTX Terminators. The box quality and package was above and beyond. Very pleased with the product. Like others have said, these things hit quite low. I listen mostly to dubstep/electronic but these also hit hard with the hiphop/rap. For $200, these subs are a damn steal. +1 to Rockford. You got my business.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter P

customer_reviews.title: hits hard
customer_reviews.text: First thing keep in mind this is a big box i bought for my mustang and they wouldnt fit in the trunk. Had to delete the rear seat and i have them all set up in the back. But awesome set up. Hits hard. I have them hooked up to a punch 1000watt amp. and that does the trick. And the price is great. Local shops want atleast twice this for the same set up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Moore

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it's made from used furniture
customer_reviews.text: I took the carpet off so I can wrap the box in leather then you can obviously see it's made from used furniture standards have gone down for Rockford Fosgate subwoofers did sound good though
customer_reviews.author: Leo S.

customer_reviews.title: No hearing
customer_reviews.text: My mom knows I'm home before I'm a mile from the house...
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: is it included?
customer_reviews.text: Is the box included with the 2 Rockford fosgate sub's? And are the subwoofers 500 watts a piece?
customer_reviews.author: Cody Perry

product_meta.title: Rockford Fosgate Punch P1-2X12 Dual P1 12" Loaded Subwoofer Enclosure Ported
product_meta.description: Size:12-Inch| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingSince day one, we have spearheaded the car audio revolution. Nothing has changed. Rockford Fosgate is still the global leader in audio innovation and your passion is our purpose. We engineer the best audio systems for your lifestyle!
feature_bullets: The P1-2X12 is a dual P1 12” SVC subwoofer in a vented enclosure that reproduces low bass frequencies accurately with high output SPL (Sound Pressure Level)
The P1-2X12 vented loaded enclosure is Internally wired to create a 2-Ohm amplifier load with power handling of 500 Watts RMS / 1000 Watts Max

Punch Loaded enclosures are constructed with durable 5/8" MDF material and feature a proprietary high-flow, low-noise port with high current binding posts for maximum signal flow to the speakers inside
The P1-2X12 loaded enclosure measures at 15.125" x 33.875" x 15.75" (HxWxD)
Famous Rockford Fosgate build quality with a full 1-year warranty when purchased from an authorized Rockford Fosgate reseller

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
